thread.title: Pen Argyl field hockey team edges Bangor
thread.title_full: Pen Argyl field hockey team edges Bangor

title: Pen Argyl field hockey team edges Bangor
text:
Complete Box Score Â» 
Pen Argyl 1, Bangor 0 -- Rapid recap 
Pen Argyl Area High School's field hockey team avenged an earlier loss to Bangor with a 1-0 Colonial League victory over the visiting Slaters on Wednesday afternoon. 
Turning point : Pen Argyl's Lacey Hempeler scored 30 seconds into the second half on an assist from Dana Evans . 
Top performers : Hempeler's goal set the tone and changed momentum into the Green Knights' favor. Goalie Kasey Hanlon also came up big with a number of key saves to preserve the shutout. 
What it means : These are two very evenly matched teams and also two of the better teams in the league. The win puts Pen Argyl in good position to qualify for the league playoffs while Bangor also most likely will secure one of the four spots.
